website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for a reliable harness for their larger dogs will find their match in this popular model.
pros: Straps are adjustable in length for dogs of varying heights
Available to purchase in sizes medium to extra-large
Allows you to lift dog without bending down
Many customers appreciated how well it worked for their aging pets
cons: Can slide back into the dog's hindquarters

customer_reviews.title: We love this harness!
customer_reviews.text: This harness works really well for our 85 lb. German Shepherd dog who has hip problems. She falls from time to time, and I have a hard time helping her get up because of her size. With the harness, it's easy. I also use it on walks when she's getting fatigued. It's well made, and I really like the way it rolls up for carrying - makes it so much easier to hang on to it! I've tried a couple of other harnesses that didn't work for various reasons, so I was very happy when this harness turned out to be the one. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. West

customer_reviews.title: I really dislike this sling
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike this sling. The handle cannot be adjusted so that my arm hangs straight while assisting my dog. My arm has to be bent at the elbow creating a lot of strain on my elbow. After every walk, I have to put ice on my elbow. I wish I would have returned it, but my dog needed assistance on very short notice, so I needed to have a sling.
customer_reviews.author: Kennyg

customer_reviews.title: Great for aging dog
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old beagle/orca mix recently blew out both of her back knees. Standing for more than a few seconds is a struggle, and walking is impossible. Using this sling to hoist up her ass end, she's able to enjoy short walks, and wrap up her bathroom needs without falling down into her fresh pile. Thanks for helping my dog get some mobility back!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Klein

customer_reviews.title: Very clever design!
customer_reviews.text: This fantastic sling arrived quickly, in time to pick my dog up from the vet after knee surgery. The vet had suggested using a towel to help lift her hind quarters when navigating the steps to go outside, but I wondered if someone had come up with a solution - and this is it! With adjustable straps and a short leash, I have a safe, even grip on my dog (imagining she could slip out of a towel sling). The company followed up with a PDF of instructions, but it is pretty intuitive. I hope I never need it again after my dog recovers, but I will hold on to it just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Mary in Maryland

customer_reviews.title: I have a basset hound so he has a different ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a basset hound so he has a different body shape than most dogs. I give it 3 stars because mine keeps curling and I think there could be more padding on the inside, I had to stop using it on my dog for a few weeks because he started to have rashes at the same spot this harness was wrapped around. It took a few weeks before the rashes disappeared and by then I started using it again, because its the only one that does a decent job assisting with my Basset Hound's rehabilitation after his back surgery. #ivddsurvivor
customer_reviews.author: Ray Jay

customer_reviews.title: The answer to my problem
customer_reviews.text: Our 90 pound lab tore his ACL and is recovering from a VERY costly surgery. This harness is exactly what we need to help him negotiate through life for the next 8 week recovery period. The animal clinic had said I could use a towel or blanket but then I have the blanket and also a leash all while I am making sure dog doesn't slip and un-do the surgical repair. Dealing with a 90 pound dog that is not completely mobile is not easy but it is so much more do-able with this harness. I am so glad this harness was available. And, the seller is super nice & provided excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Sue from the South

customer_reviews.title: This Harness Really Helps!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Large for my Brother & his Family's 75 lb German Shepherd. Material was Strong, but soft against Brandi's belly. Straps were made well and never ripped away from the comfort pad. Easy to put on and take off. This Harness was a great tool for us and Brandi. Well worth the money. I would diffidently recommend it to everyone! Thank you AMZpets for making a simple product that really works. RIP Brandi Girl xoxoxo
customer_reviews.author: K9 Lover

customer_reviews.title: Needs a strap across the front of the dog!
customer_reviews.text: While the harness seems durable, it slips too easily on my dog. It needs a ribbon/cord/strap of some sort across the front of the dog to keep it from moving too far back, where it ends up covering his "business" and he ends up peeing into the harness. It's OK if you need it to help lift your dog on the back, but if he's out to go potty, this becomes a bit messy! Check out the photo by AMZpets selling the product. I'll still use it though and keep hiking it up!
customer_reviews.author: John D. Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Top option for those with lame dogs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 12 year old Newfoundland who was having trouble walking. Unfortunately, he died the day before this arrived. It seems to be well made, however, and I purchased it because of all the positive reviews. I'm going to keep this for my other dogs, just in case, or give it to my local doggy-daycare facility that used towels to help my Newfoundland get around, happily, in his last few days. I love and miss you, Jack!
customer_reviews.author: starbrite70

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use lift harness
customer_reviews.text: This is a Durable, easy to use lift harness. I have a medium size dog, a border collie. She measures 27" in girth and only 22" near her hind legs. I found the medium size harness fits her perfectly. Her hind legs have become weak, and I purchased this to help her get in the car, go up steps, and get in our RV without falling backwards because of poor control of her hind legs. It's wide enough to give good support, and worth the cost of the harness! She doesn't mind the harness being on, and seems to appreciate the extra help.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: The support lift is easy to put on/off and we actually keep it on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd AMZ dog support sling. Our 17 yr. old with chronic arthritis is able to get in/out of the car, get on/off the couch, use the bathroom outside w/out falling, and use the steps with the use of her support sling. It supports and lifts her without physical pain to the both of us. The support lift is easy to put on/off and we actually keep it on her 24/7 and it doesn't bother her. Shipped fast and washes/dries easy.
customer_reviews.author: rhs

customer_reviews.title: This harness is great. Our dog herniated a disc
customer_reviews.text: This harness is great. Our dog herniated a disc, which paralyzed him on 3 out of his 4 legs. He needed surgery to correct it but it will still take a couple of months rehab to get strength back. I bought this for his physical therapy. I give it 4 stars because the sizing chart is off. We ordered him a medium but definitely needs a small. He is a 25lb Boston Terrier, not sure his measurements but the medium is way too big. Once the small becomes available, I will be ordered that.
customer_reviews.author: nelnolan

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the harness Is good. However the design Is Not very good For ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the harness Is good. However the design Is Not very good For a male dog. This thing would work perfect for a female. There's no cut out on the sling for a male dog. therefore the sling has to come off in order for him to go pee. This to me seems like a huge design flaw and a massive Inconvenience. This is the first time I've ever had to use a sling So I'm not sure if they are all the same. So I had to modify this harness myself.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I was using a towel or scarf to help my dog up the stairs but this is much safer for the dog. Easy to carry but very quick to use if needed. Sturdy and seems very comfortable for my dog. It doesn't get in the way of going potty for my female dog so I can leave it on. Highly recommend. Great price.

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work well at all for our Bassett hound. Was a waist of money! We rescue hounds and know very well how to make proper measurements of our dogs. May work for other breeds but not Bassets
customer_reviews.author: Nomad

customer_reviews.title: Both the dog and us are getting used to using the support sling.
customer_reviews.text: We have a 12 year old Great Dane who is nearly blind and has arthritis. She has a difficult time getting up and climbing stairs. We purchased this sling to aide her when she needs our help.We got the XL which fits well because her stomach area is smaller than her chest. Right now it has been a struggle getting the sling under her when she is laying down. We hope to get better with practice. Due to her weight (135#) we may sometimes have to use this as a sling with each of us on a side rather than as a harness - the separate adjustable straps will help.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn, Columbus OH

customer_reviews.title: I bought the large assuming it would be a good fit. It would be an awesome sling had ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 100 lb rottweiler after his 3rd knee surgery. I think I got too big of a size because it slips and doesn't seem to be tight. I bought the large assuming it would be a good fit. It would be an awesome sling had I gotten the correct size, make sure to measure before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great invention for my old dog!
customer_reviews.text: This does support my lab very well since she has problems with her legs. She is getting older (14) and losing weight so there is more room now in the harness but it still functions when I need it. I should have purchased 2 different sizes realizing the weight loss would be coming but this does suffice for now. I was using a towel but this works soooo much better!
customer_reviews.author: Books R 4 Me

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for to help senior dog with arthritis!
customer_reviews.text: This harness has been amazing!! Our dog has some pretty severe arthritis and falls on our walks from time to time. She hates when you try to pick her up and cries so loud the neighbors come out. So we ordered this to help easily pick her up without the drama! It is so easy, fits her perfectly. Her physical therapist thinks it's a great tool for her as well. She wears it on walks and when we go for her therapy or vet vista and she can still go potty and doesn't even notice it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this harness to help my 4 year old yellow lab recover from TPLO surgery. It has been a God send!!! Since a very limited amount of weight can be put on her rear knee I seriously don't know how I would have supported her. A towel could have worked but would have been cumbersome. This fits perfectly around her and gives her the support she needs without getting in the way or cutting into her. The vets office even commented on what a nice harness it was! Btw... I ordered a lg for my 72 lb baby girl and it was perfect🐾❤️
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: The harness gave him confidence that he could use his leg as much or as little as he wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this support harness to help my 10-year-old springer spaniel following ACL surgery. The harness is lightweight and well-made, and it supported him the first few days following the surgery when he was reluctant to use his repaired leg. The harness gave him confidence that he could use his leg as much or as little as he wanted - he was happy to be mobile in the yard. On the fourth day after surgery he was walking on his leg without the harness; I was grateful to have the harness during those first awkward days.
customer_reviews.author: MovieMusic Fan

customer_reviews.title: Chance's Quality of Life is much better with this sling.
customer_reviews.text: As my pug is losing control of his rear legs due to age and I am sure degenerative disks, His scootching along on his butt became frequent and I was noticing that he was scraping his paws that he was dragging. I ordered this sling, and during the first application after wearing if for a bit we took it for a walk... He didn't do stairs but was attempting to run when he found his rear legs supported. Potty breaks seem much easier..
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Whitney

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Customer Service - Ben was so incredibly helpful! My first order, I purchased a Lg which was too big...I explained to Ben my situation and he set me up with a GREAT discount for the 2nd order I had to place. The harness works great for my 72lb Boxer. She isn't 100% sold on it yet, but she doesn't hate it either. She is pretty particular and just needs some time to get use to having this set up - overall this has been an excellent experience and I definitely recommend this product to anyone who's furbaby is struggling with their hind leg mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool
customer_reviews.text: My Labrador briefly had an injury that turned out not to be as serious as suspected, yet was unable to maneuver stairs. Getting her down the 6 stairs to the yard to relieve herself and back up again was an issue. After keeping her mobility monitored and using the harness to go up and down stairs for a week, she healed without continued difficulty. She actually waited for us to slip it without attempting to climb, so she obviously appreciated it. Hopefully we won't need it again, but with 2 old dogs we will probably be glad we have it.
customer_reviews.author: pamela jane

customer_reviews.title: Seems to make walking more comfortable for her
customer_reviews.text: Our 55 lb. mixed breed has a rear paw with ligament deterioration. She is scheduled to have surgery but the wait list to get scheduled is lengthy. We bought the lifting harness to help take some of the weight off the the paw when she goes up and down the steps outside. Seems to make walking more comfortable for her. Recuperation from surgery will take two months. We thought getting her adjusting to walking with a lifting harness now might help with the adjustment she'll have to make after surgery during her recovery.
customer_reviews.author: LindaR

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and helpful product
customer_reviews.text: There was an error with my original order but the company was fabulous about working with me to get it corrected. The product is helpful. I use it to help support our older dog that has 2 bad knees and advanced hip displasia. I like that it takes some of the weight off while she is standing. It bunches a little b/c she is a pitt and is thick in the chest area but it is fine since it still gives her added support by taking some of the pressure off.
customer_reviews.author: 94Grl

customer_reviews.title: Has helped a lot
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. Our golden retriever is almost 13. Struggles most of the time to get up. Situation is in the hind legs. She loves to go for short walks and I take this with me 'in case'. I find that when I use it, it gives her more confidence to move faster. More security...
customer_reviews.author: Tina D.

customer_reviews.title: A thoughtfully designed product - an excellent choice for our healing dog.
customer_reviews.text: Our Rottweiler had TPLO surgery to repair a torn cruciate ligament. She will need to be assisted with a lift sling for the next two to four weeks. There were a number of harnesses to choose from on Amazon but I liked that AMZpets offered an extra large harness with a connecting strap to the collar, making handling of the dog much easier. The Dog Lift Harness arrived on time and was exactly what I needed. It fits our rottie perfectly and makes handling her far easier than the towel we started with yesterday. The lift harness is of quality construction and meets my highest expectation. I'm glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Hancock

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This lift harness is great. I was having trouble lifting my 90 lb boxer, whose back legs are lame, to go outside. She took to it right away. She still can do her outside duties while I am assisting her with the harness. Plus... I received emails directly from the company. I told them I ordered the M, but it was not going to be big enough and they sent a L replacement for free, and told me to donate the M to a dog owner in need. How kind, right? I recommend this product to anybody who is having trouble lifting an old or handicapped dog.
customer_reviews.author: boxer mom

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend a Ruffwear dog harness with handles instead
customer_reviews.text: Tried using with my dog who has a weak back end. (80 lb lab) We didn't find this helpful at all. I would recommend a Ruffwear dog harness with handles instead. Purchased one and ruffwear came today. Going to see if I can return this. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MelMal

customer_reviews.title: Great help for older dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my in-law's 125 German Shepherd. He was 12 years old, and had issues going up our steps. I could put this under him, and he'd climb right on up the steps. After a while, he was having trouble getting up in general. My in-laws could use this to help him get up off the floor, and you could tell he was grateful. This helped an older, good, big, old, boy enjoy a little bit more life when he was slowing down.
customer_reviews.author: EllaEmma

customer_reviews.title: Great help for my elderly dog
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product to assist my dog who has knee problems. FYI- This would only work for a female dog, male dogs wouldn't be able to tinkle with it on. Just hope the velcro doesn't give out over the years due to wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Not good for male dogs urinating
customer_reviews.text: The lift harness is good but on my male dog he cannot urinate with it on. It works well as just a lift assist but i also needed it to use when he needs to do his business. I should have picked that up from the picture but missed it
customer_reviews.author: Monet S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy story *please read*
customer_reviews.text: My dog had an extremely large fatty cyst on his chest. He could barely walk towards the end. The poor guy had so much stamina. I used this to help him walk when he couldn't stand up on his own. I also used it the day we put him down to help him walk his final steps into the vet. He breathed his last as I whispered how grateful I was to have him as my only friend.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J.

customer_reviews.title: We all need a lift sometimes
customer_reviews.text: What a great invention for old dogs. Our rescue dog is new to us but old to life and has trouble raising and controlling movement in his back half. He finds when he goes upstairs then he is up the stairs which means needing to get back DOWN the stairs. This lift gives him the sense of security that with our help he can manage to get down again. It's helped him adjust to a two story house and I think will come in handy many times and ways as age diminishes his back leg strength even more. Thank you for the strong construction for even our 63 pounds of dog.
customer_reviews.author: gingia

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: This harness is just what my 14-year old 3- legged dog and I needed. The medium size fits my 50 pound pit bull very well. It allows me to walk her and lift her hind quarters when she tires on her hind leg. So instead of lying down when her hind leg gives out, I can gently lift her just enough for her to be able to continue walking. It takes a little time for both of us to get used to the harness as it takes a little coordination to use it. It's easier to use than her wheel chair and not as bulkie. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Erin G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 100 lab lab with torn ACL
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for "towel walking" my 100 pond lab after his torn ACL surgery! The only problem for a male dog is when you take him out to go potty, it fits right under that part of his anatomy so a few times I couldn't get it off quick enough so he peed in it. I don't know if one could be designed with some sort of opening there because removing it also defeated the goal of keeping weight off his leg. (A towel has the same issue). Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet a great product. The only issue being that since he ...
customer_reviews.text: This harness added 3 weeks on to my precious boys life after his hips stopped working. Simple yet a great product. The only issue being that since he was a boy this would get pee all over it :( The harness doesn't stay on as is shown in picture- it bunches up but still does the trick. I would recommend for any pets with hip problems.
customer_reviews.author: Karen I. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Simple Solution
customer_reviews.text: This product is simple to use, and so helpful for my old dog--and old lady me too. I like the adjustable handles for bridging the gap between my reach and her rear elevation, making it much easier for us both to shuffle along. She is able to squat easily too, much needed relief! We can do thresholds and steps too, haven't tried getting into the car yet but I know it will make a difference. The Lifting Harness is an inexpensive, low-tech aid for dogs and owners, I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: LizB

customer_reviews.title: The sound of the Velcro freaked out my senior dog!
customer_reviews.text: It was to cumbersome to take on and off each time we had to take our dog up and down the stairs every time she needed to go outside. Also the sound of the Velcro freaked her out. We found using a large bath towel around her mid section and her collar was a better solution!
customer_reviews.author: Chipsol

customer_reviews.title: works going up but not down
customer_reviews.text: At first this worked great...but only going up the stairs. It is way too big and the Velcro doesn't stay together when going down and my dog slips right out of it. It has now would up sitting at the bottom of the stairs and we do not use it. I should return but I think I've had it too long.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST THING, A HARNESS
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST THING,A HARNESS, TO HANDLE YOUR DOG. I HAVE A PIT BULL MIX WITH BULL DOG. SUGAR IS VERY VERY STRONG. I HAD A HARD TIME HANDLING HER, UNTIL I WENT OUT AND GOT HER A HARNESS. WHAT A DIFFERENCE IT MAKES. GOOD CONTROL OF THE DOG, AND SHE LIKES IT. TRY IT FOR YOUR DOG. DEE
customer_reviews.author: DEE

customer_reviews.title: I figure I better do something to help ease the weight she has ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my twelve-year-old golden retriever after she hurt her left knee. Since she already hurt her right knee half a year earlier, I figure I better do something to help ease the weight she has to put on both of her knees. I like this product because it is very light. Since my golden does not require my help all the time on our walks, the lightness of this product allows me to just let it hang around her waist when she does not need my assistance. I can easily pick-up the straps and provide help to her when needed. I would recommend this product to anyone whose dog may need some extra assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Ho

customer_reviews.title: Worthless!!!
customer_reviews.text: It failed to give the support my poor, now late dog needed. It would just bundle up and basically was a worthless piece of ****. It hurt my poor girl more than it ever helped. Only used it twice, had to find a better option. Now I'm stuck with this stupid thing, and no dog!!! ;-(
customer_reviews.author: my034runner

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made and has changed the way our dog is able to function. The handles can be adjusted so that you don't have to bend down to walk with your pet. My only complaint is that the measurements seem to be off. The size that corresponded with my dogs weight and abdominal area were a medium, but that ended up to be too large. The sling still works but with a LOT of room. All in all a very good product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought but still good
customer_reviews.text: I bought the largest one because I have a 100 lb German Shepherd Dog, but I probably should have dropped down a size. It is perfect for her chest area, but too large for the stomach area to assist the hind legs. Still works, but bunches up toward the back. It would be nice if they added some kind of ribbing to keep it from bunching up. Overall it’s my bad for buying too large of one but keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Brad J Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and caring service
customer_reviews.text: I just want to thank the company for their empathy during this difficult time. The harness arrived on time and fit my dog perfectly. It has been a great help in getting my dog up the stairs. I live in a row home and there are a lot of stairs to deal with. This certainly lightens my load.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M.

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: My staffordshire terrier tore both of her ACL’s, her surgery took place one leg at a time during my pregnancy, so obviously I had a hard time lifting her up. This was perfect for helping her get up and down stairs, going potty and getting back to her bed. I would say this definitely made for an easier recovery, she’s doing great!!! Thank you for a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: My golden retriever is around 90 pounds. He is thirteen years old so his back legs are very weak, making it difficult for him to get up sometimes. We got this harness (size XL) to help him get up more easily with less stress. It works wonders. I highly recommend this product. The harness arrived on the day it was scheduled to, and the company was willing to help throughout the entire process.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: but it is not a good fit for her
customer_reviews.text: This harness does help my dog walk, but it is not a good fit for her. She has a very deep chest, which causes the harness to bunch up in her abdomen. Also, since she is a very old dog, she has very little muscle and very little fat, so I worry that the bunched up harness will not stay comfortable around her wasp-like waist. This would be a great product for a more tubular dog, or one that still has some muscle. Like I said, we did manage to go for a walk -- longer than she could do before. But I will keep shopping for one that won't bunch up on her body type.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good lift support
customer_reviews.text: The support fit my needs! My dog has arthritis in her hind legs and has a hard time getting up sometimes. This is perfect to help her stand up with little strain on her weak legs. However, because of the way it is made, it slides back a bit and hinders the way she walks. She has to work harder to walk when I try to aid her with this on. I bought it mainly to help her stand, so it meets my needs. If you are looking for a walking aid, I would recommend a full body, or half body, harness.

customer_reviews.title: Support for my precious 13 year old and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I bought for my 13 year old lab. It’s gotten to the point where she falls when squatting to take care of business. I am able to give her support she needs with this and also help her to get up from a sitting or lying down position. It’s soft and comfortable for her too and easy on and off unlike another that I tried and returned because was just too complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: allowing my older pets to easily stand up then
customer_reviews.text: Older dogs with arthritis in their hindquarters find it extremely difficult to get up from the floor. This harness is a tremendous help so that I can slip it under and pull the straps so the rear end is gently lifted, allowing my older pets to easily stand up then.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Before I used it I noticed that there are two ...
customer_reviews.text: Before I used it I noticed that there are two snap buttons but they don't fit together. When I tried to snap them together, the female snap fell off and now there is a hole there. (See image: snap that fell off is next to the hole in the fabric.) I hope the rest of the harness doesn't fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Public name

customer_reviews.title: Helped our old dog. Could be more adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Our old dog was helped by this product. Could be more adjustable ... there is no overlap between large and extra large ... ended up buying the other size too and it was a little too small and this was a little too big. Could have a better way to keep the straps from dangling. Ended up tying them together and clamping a carabiner on them to keep the knot from undoing.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: My 15yr old cocker spaniel has developed a spine issue and one of his hind legs gives out on him frequently. I was just about ready to buy a more expensive support harness, then spied this one. Very happy with the quality. I've only had to use it a couple of times (so far) and it took my boy a few minutes to get it, but am so happy to have it on hand - just in case. It was a tad large for him, but we made it work. He is a bit on the thin side for a cocker spaniel.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dog Lift Support
customer_reviews.text: My dog had ACL surgery on his rear right leg and could not put any weight on it. This harness helped us get him outside so he could relieve himself while recovering from the surgery. The harness was a life saver, the shipping was quick and the customer service was awesome. I highly recommend the harness and AMZpets.
customer_reviews.author: SuzanZan

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend for male dogs
customer_reviews.text: We have a 13-year old male corgi with arthritis in his rear legs. We hoped that this harness would allow him to go on walks more easily with our other, healthier dog, but the design of this harness is such that his penis is always within the harness. I don't really understand how this product could work for male dogs that need to eliminate; seems poorly designed. The instructions do not acknowledge dog gender or elimination in the slightest.
customer_reviews.author: SarahW330

customer_reviews.title: Love this sling
customer_reviews.text: Love this sling. It is light and easy to use. It takes me a couple of seconds to put it on my dog whom just had a TPLO surgery. When I walk her with it, my back does not suffer anymore. Thank you to the seller for the follow up email and for making sure all is well. Great customer service. I did not try the sling for stairs or getting into the car yet. It is still too soon at this early stage in the rehab. Stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: Justbreathe7

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit well under the chest so it's best for under the belly
customer_reviews.text: Very basic but does the job. Does not fit well under the chest so it's best for under the belly. I hated that I even needed it but was glad I had it when I did.
customer_reviews.author: Booker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy materials used
customer_reviews.text: the lift support was exactly what I needed for my geriatric dog when on stairs. Sturdy materials used. Cost is very reasonable. I would recommend this product to any one who has a dog that needs some help getting around.
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for helping your dog keep its mobility
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for helping your dog keep its mobility. We use it to support our 12 year old Lab when she goes up the stairs. It is a great design, is well made and appears to be durable. I highly recommend this product. The customer service provided by AMZpets was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Clover Daisy

customer_reviews.title: swim therapy
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a problem getting our female boxer into the car for her swim therapy so we thought we would give this a try - weren't too sure how the dog would take to it, but she has, so, so-far-so-good. Strong, sturdy, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: gskat

customer_reviews.title: Does its job supporting dog's back end so she can get in the car
customer_reviews.text: I can see where keeping this on the dog would cause it to "squish" as expressed in some of the comments, however, I've used it just to get the dog in the backseat of the car and it suits our needs. I take it off once she's in. I think the quality is good and I like the little neoprene disc with velcro that you wrap around the handles. It's just the extra support she needs.
customer_reviews.author: WixiePixie

customer_reviews.title: ... not been able to use the harness as our sweet dog took a turn for the worse
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we have not been able to use the harness as our sweet dog took a turn for the worse. She is a 14 year old lab mix who sprained her knee by falling down a few of the front steps several weeks ago. We were hoping the harness would help with her rehab but she is just not bouncing back from this. It's a wonderful product, arrived when promised, seems easy to use and would be very helpful in different circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It's helped our 12 y/o German Shepherd. Much easier for him to get up.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Our old dog sure appreciates this sling!
customer_reviews.text: We have a very very old dog who sometimes topples over and can't get up. This is easy to slide under her and lift her back onto her feet, and she sure appreciates it! It's much easier on one's back than trying to lift a 35-40 lb dog. Once I lift her, it acts as a crutch for me to guide her back to her bed.
customer_reviews.author: leslie benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Dog lift harness
customer_reviews.text: I have a 130 lb. German Shepherd with a missing rear leg due to surgery at a young age. As he has been getting older (8 years) he is having issues going up the stairs. This harness has made it much easier for him to navigate the stairs and it worked the first time I used it. I would highly recommend it to any dog owner with climbing or walking issues.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: we just need it to help her up and into ...
customer_reviews.text: we just need it to help her up and into the car - it is soft - and does not seem to bother her - and it stays in place - have used scarves - and they slide up and become uncomfortable! -
customer_reviews.author: liskollmar

customer_reviews.title: Eady to use when my dog wouldn't bear weight on her back leg
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Good quality for short term use. It helped my dog when she tore her ACL and wouldn't bear weight on the leg. It made it a lot easier for me!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M. Schutter

customer_reviews.title: Harness works well and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a herniated disk and this has been a great addition for when he cannot go up / down the stairs. It is also easy to put on him and use.
customer_reviews.author: Kris W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: My 65 lb golden retriever just had her third knee surgery in two years . This harness is great . The large fits perfectly. The Velcro is adjustable to allow some give or take . My dog does have to go up six steps into and out of the house five times daily . I highly recommend this if you're unfortunately in the same situation as I am with an injured best friend .
customer_reviews.author: Jean Mary

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty much useless. The handles are too short unless your are 5' or under. The wrap covers the penis so the poor dog pees all over himself. Feeling pretty ripped off. I would not recommend it at all.
customer_reviews.author: TamaraH

customer_reviews.title: the adjustable strap is great. We are still on a learning curve with ...
customer_reviews.text: This dog harness is exceptionally well made and strong. the adjustable strap is great. We are still on a learning curve with it. Daisy isn't sure she is ready for such a thing. She is a blue heeler with her own ideas. But it makes it much easier to pick her up and help her into the truck, etc. I would recommend this to anyone whose dog needs assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: This is super helpful! My dog had to go through an ...
customer_reviews.text: This is super helpful! My dog had to go through an unpleasant injury and the harness has been very helpful for her rehabilitation process. I can see how she's getting more confident every time we go on a walk, get into the car, get in and out of her crate, etc. The harness seems to be very high quality, gives the dog a good support. We absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Krasnopolsky

customer_reviews.title: Handy Dog Sling
customer_reviews.text: Sadly my large goldendoodle hurt his back leg. Had been using a beach towel to help carry his 80 lb weight on the stairs, till I ordered this. Easy on & off with Velcro make a quick solution and the handles make it easy for me to help our dog. I ordered an XL and it's a little loose but comfortable. The inside material is soft on the body. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl R.

customer_reviews.title: I have only used it a few times. My ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a few times. My dog is 13. Once I put it on, she doesn't want to move. It is hard to get her in motion while I am holding on to the middle section to give her support AND using the leash to move her forward.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: We've used this for both of my guy's TPLO surgeries, 8 weeks apart & it worked just as expected. My only wish is that it was a bit bigger (longer) but that's because my guy is a giant breed, so it would fit most dogs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: KateRK

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I like this harness bc it is very easy to use and fits comfortably on my dog. The strap length is adjustable which is great, and there are snaps to hold it closed in a roll when not in use. That’s handy for me bc my dog only wears it to get up and down stairs and then I carry it on our walks. Overall I really like it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna D

customer_reviews.title: This harness is making it so easy to help her up and around the yard
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our 90+ pound german shepherd who suffered a seizure and sustained paralyzes to her rear leg. She is in pain. This harness is making it so easy to help her up and around the yard. She does not mind it being on her. Highly recommend for your fur baby who needs help. Easy on your back as well.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mayes

customer_reviews.title: Good Unless You Have a Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my German shepherd, and it wasn't great due to my dog's deep chest--the sling would slip down to the hip. For a dog with less narrowing from chest to hip, I think it would be perfect. I tried several, and this was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Honeybear’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: My 80 lb Belguin shepherd has developed severe arthritis and ...
customer_reviews.text: My 80 lb Belguin shepherd has developed severe arthritis and so was having trouble getting into and out of our vehicle. The Dog Lift Harness enables us to continue our walks with his basset hound sister.
customer_reviews.author: abqsue

customer_reviews.title: Worst Imaginable Design...
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I’ve ever purchased on Amazon. It’s a terrible design and poorly constructed. Spend the extra $40 to buy the Ruffwear harness. Now THAT is an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: We Like Mondays

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than home-made solutions
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well. Was able to leave it on my dog and release the handle part, So I didn't have to make her uncomfortable every time she had to go outside. It did bunch up though and made for too much pressure in one spot. Could be improved but worked great generally.
customer_reviews.author: GeorginaConlee

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Please measure the rear waist of your dog. Don't go via the weight guide. I went via the weight guide and my 80lb pitbull the large was too big. AMZpets is wonderful and has a great customer service. The leader leash broke and when I wrote AMZpets they responded immediately and not only are they replacing it they are giving me the correct size. THANK YOU AMZpets from Bella (our Pitty)
customer_reviews.author: Bardouns

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I used this harness to lift my 98lb 12-yr-old lab. It has been VERY helpful. Great quality; great price! I would recommend it to others who have extra large dogs who need help with getting up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Rowland

customer_reviews.title: They want to make sure this is the right thing for you an absolutely make it right if you aren't 100% happy. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This business is fabulous. The owner is very responsive to messages, follows up on orders and fit. They want to make sure this is the right thing for you an absolutely make it right if you aren't 100% happy. I highly recommend you purchase from here if you are even considering a sling for your dog. I have had a great experience. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Broken clip on first use.
customer_reviews.text: The part that wraps around my girl fits great, she is a 104 pound White German Shepherd and the item is a large, it fits great. The " clip-in" leash broke on the first use. This clip is very cheap material. I would have given 5 stars if it wasn't for the clip breaking. I love the adjustable straps, and my girl is laying around comfortably with it on (I am not always leaving it on, just getting her used to it).
customer_reviews.author: Janice D.

customer_reviews.title: The company was great - even sent me a PDF of instructions
customer_reviews.text: It is the second one we purchased. We bought an XL first and it worked but was a little big so we bought a Large. It has helped so much with getting our dog up and down the stairs. She loves it and waits for us to put it on her. The company was great - even sent me a PDF of instructions. Great Service
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Great harness received quickly
customer_reviews.text: My dog had to have surgery after tearing his ACL. This wrap was so easy to put around his stomach when he was standing and unsteady - just put it under and Velcro on the top. The handles were adjustable to my height so I did not hurt my back helping to support his weight. Received very quickly and in new condition.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Moore

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: I am using this post ACL surgery for my 55 lb boxer mix. It keeps her steady, making sure the good knee does not slip or twist because it is taking all her weight. It also allows her to extend the sore leg more ... seems to make her more confident that she can stretch it out without putting weight on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Archey

customer_reviews.title: Never actually tried it..
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our dog but he died suddenly before the product arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: and I have to imagine it would work better for smaller dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent product, and I have to imagine it would work better for smaller dogs. The only issue I have with it is that the harness tend to bunch up at the waist which caused some irritation. That may be because my dog weighs upwards of 140lbs though. This was just a temporary solution to keep weight off of her back legs for a couple of weeks after she had surgery on her ACL and overall it served it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Domin

customer_reviews.title: Happy Pooch, Happy Owner
customer_reviews.text: This item worked well to support my dog. The straps could be a little longer though, but I am tall and have long arms. For the price, I didn't mind. I linked the leash through it, and was able to use it comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great for old doggos
customer_reviews.text: This perfectly suits my old dog's needs. She's a 14 year old German Shepherd and her hind legs are starting to fail. This harness makes it much easier to help her get up without hurting her. I'm glad I bought it, and I'm sure you will be too. (I got XL for my German Shepherd btw and it's a snug fit)
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great help for his mobility Easy put on and seems ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an older (13yr) large dog. He is having trouble getting into the car and some problems walking sometimes. This has been a great help for his mobility Easy put on and seems to be comfortable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Works for a still partial mobile animal.
customer_reviews.text: Bunches up and the handles adjust themselves when in use making it harder to hold our dog up.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Item came as promised. Very good quality and fair price. The only issue I have is that my 15 yr old Kelpie mix has severe arthritis in hind legs. When she lays down she cannot get back up on her own, I was hoping this support harness would help in lifting her back up. She weighs about 40 lbs. It is very difficult for one person to get the harness underneath her to be able to help her get up. Work in progress.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Rioux

customer_reviews.title: Not for small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my late baby. He was a 10 lb pom. He was old and needed a lift when he goes. But this pad is just too big for him. It was making him uncomfortable. Used once and never use it again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great and helpful harness for German Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: Great harness! My German Shepherd (85 pounds) is prone to seizures and his back legs are very weak. This helps us pick him up when he needs an extra push. Easy to put on and very helpful when he needs support. We've also used this to help him into the car for vet visits and it's worked wonders.
customer_reviews.author: The 3am Impulse Buyer

product_meta.title: AMZpets Dog Lift Harness Support Sling Helps Dogs with Weak Front or Rear Legs Stand Up, Walk, Get Into Cars, Climb Stairs. Best Alternative to Dog Wheelchair
product_meta.description: Size:X-SmallAMZpets dog lifting harness for X-small dogs.
feature_bullets: Designed for extra small dogs ; Recommended for dogs with girth measurements of 15-18 inches ; Best for dogs weighing 7-15 pounds. Lifting support pad is 19.5 inches long X 4.7 inches wide ; Measuring your dog’s body measurements before ordering the sling is recommended ; For more sizing information, see our sizing chart at the images section on this product page

Restore your dog's freedom of movement ; AMZpets Dog Lift Harness was designed to aid dogs with limited mobility support their body weight while standing up, climbing stairs, using car ramps for getting in and out of vehicles and more ; Our lifting harness is a great solution for dogs suffering from injuries or recovering from one, and highly recommended for dogs suffering from Arthritis or orthopedic problems ; Makes a great alternative to dogs wheelchairs

Give your dog a lift with ease ; No more bending down, as AMZpets lifting dog harness will always be there to assist your dog, but not at the expense of your health! We designed our dog lift to have adjustable handles to maximize your comfort ; Works for all dog owners regardless of their height

Easy to use, easy to care for ; Putting the dog support harness on takes only a few seconds ; A Step-By-Step Instruction Manual arrives with the support harness ; When not in use, our lifting sling rolls for easy carrying and storage
Great alternative to dog wheelchairs, carts, traditional dog slings and towels
